title: CLDF dataset derived from Heggarty, Paul & Anderson, Cormac & Scarborough, Matthew’s "Indo-European Cognate Relationships database" ([IE-CoR version 1.0](https://github.com/lexibank/iecor/releases/tag/v1.0)) from 2019
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Heggarty, Paul & Anderson, Cormac & Scarborough, Matthew 2024. Indo-European Cognate Relationships database (IE-CoR version 1.1). Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology
